a. ∫_0^a 1/(x+1) dx = ln(x+1)|_0^a = ln(a+1) - ln1 = ln(a+1) = 1, a+1 = e, a = e-1.
b. Median m = 1/e, Pr(X < 1/e | X < 1) = Pr(X < 1/e) / Pr(X < 1) since 1/e <1. Pr(X < c) = ln(c+1). So ln(1/e +1)/ln(2) = ln((1 + e)/e ) / ln2 = [ln(1+e) -1]/ln2. But solution 1/2, perhaps m defined such.
